languages.text: {n}Абеляр заходится старческим кашлем.{/n} "Трижды клятый ксенос просто вышвырнул меня, как мусор. Я отправился искать вас... или помощь... И забрел сюда. А тут меня встретило... нечто. Память подводит меня, я помню только какие-то обрывки... И иглы. Из меня что-то выкачивали, что-то вкалывали..."

traits.locale_text: "Вы имеете в виду..." {n}Абеляр заходится старческим кашлем.{/n} "Имеете в виду, после того как трижды клятый ксенос поймал нас в западню? Память подводит меня... помню какие-то обрывки... разговоры, иглы, из меня что-то выкачивали, что-то вкалывали... последнее, что осталось в голове — то, как меня спустили по какому-то желобу. Прямо сюда, словно мусор!"
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр заходится старческим кашлем.{/n} "Трижды клятый ксенос просто вышвырнул меня, как мусор. Я отправился искать вас... или помощь... И забрел сюда. А тут меня встретило... нечто. Память подводит меня, я помню только какие-то обрывки... И иглы. Из меня что-то выкачивали, что-то вкалывали..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard lets out an old man's cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply cast me aside like rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I wandered in here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは老人のような咳に悩まされている。{/n}「あの三度の爆破を受けた異種族どもは、私をゴミの山のように放り投げまし。あなたを探しに…助けを求めて…ここにたどり着いたのです。気づけばここにいました…記憶が曖昧で、断片的にしか思い出せません…それから針も。私の体から何かを抜き取り…そして何かを注入した…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは老人のような咳に悩まされている。{/n}「あの三度の爆破を受けた異種族どもは、私をゴミの山のように放り投げまし。あなたを探しに…助けを求めて…ここにたどり着いたのです。気づけばここにいました…記憶が曖昧で、断片的にしか思い出せません…それから針も。私の体から何かを抜き取り…そして何かを注入した…」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德像个老人一样咳嗽起来。{/n}“那个该死的异形把我像丢垃圾一样丢到了这里，我去找你……或者打算寻求帮助……最后就到了这个地方。我在那里碰到了它，那个……家伙。我的记性已经不行了，我只记得各种各样的碎片……和针头。它从我身体里抽走了某些东西，又注射进来某些东西……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德像个老人一样咳嗽起来。{/n}“那个该死的异形把我像丢垃圾一样丢到了这里，我去找你……或者打算寻求帮助……最后就到了这个地方。我在那里碰到了它，那个……家伙。我的记性已经不行了，我只记得各种各样的碎片……和针头。它从我身体里抽走了某些东西，又注射进来某些东西……”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard se dobla bajo los efectos de una tos de anciano.{/n} «Esos xenos tres veces malditos me echaron a un lado como si fuera basura. Fui a buscarle... o a buscar ayuda... y acabé aquí. Aquí es donde me encontró, esa... cosa. La memoria me falla, lo único que puedo recordar son trozos... y agujas. Bombeó algo dentro y fuera de mí...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard suelta una tos de anciano.{/n} «Esos xenos tres veces maldito me echaron a un lado como si fuera un montón de basura. Fui a buscarle... o a buscar ayuda... y acabé aquí. Aquí es donde me encontró, esa... cosa. La memoria me falla, lo único que puedo recordar son trozos... y agujas. Bombeó algo dentro y fuera de mí...».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard wird vom heiseren Lachen eines alten Mannes erschüttert.{/n} "Dieser dreifachverfluchte Xenos hat mich einfach achtlos weggeworfen wie Müll. Ich wollte Euch suchen ... oder Hilfe ... und bin hier gelandet. Hier hat es mich gefunden, dieses ... Ding. Ich kann mich nicht mehr genau erinnern, nur an kleine Fetzen ... und an Nadeln. Es hat etwas aus mir herausgepumpt und etwas anderes hinein ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard hustet wie ein alter Mann.{/n} "Dieser dreifachverfluchte Xenos hat mich einfach achtlos weggeworfen wie Müll. Ich wollte Euch suchen ... oder Hilfe ... und bin hier gelandet. Hier hat es mich gefunden, dieses ... Ding. Ich kann mich nicht mehr genau erinnern, nur an kleine Fetzen ... und an Nadeln. Es hat etwas aus mir herausgepumpt und etwas anderes hinein ..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abélard tousse comme le vieillard qu'il semble être devenu.{/n} « Ce maudit xénos m'a simplement balancé comme une vieille chaussette. Je suis parti à votre recherche... en espérant trouver de l'aide... et j'ai atterri ici. C'est là que cette... chose m'a trouvé. Mais ma mémoire me fait défaut. Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'est qu'il y avait des aiguilles. Des aiguilles qui m'ont prélevé quelque chose, et d'autres qui m'ont injecté quelque chose... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard tousse comme le vieillard qu'il semble être devenu.{/n} « Ce maudit xénos m'a simplement balancé comme une vieille chaussette. Je suis parti à votre recherche... en espérant trouver de l'aide... et j'ai atterri ici. C'est là que cette... chose m'a trouvé. Mais ma mémoire me fait défaut. Tout ce dont je me souviens, c'est qu'il y avait des aiguilles. Des aiguilles qui m'ont prélevé quelque chose, et d'autres qui m'ont injecté quelque chose... »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Abelard, ihtiyarlara özgü bir kuru öksürük nöbetine tutuluyor.{/n} "Boyu posu devrilesice zeno, beni tuttuğu gibi bir kenara attı. Sizin peşinize düştüm... Yardım bulmaya çalıştım... Nafile. Kendimi burada buldum. Şu ne idiği belirsiz şey, burada bana musallat oldu. Hatırlamakta güçlük çekiyorum. Büyük bir kısmı aklımdan çıkmış... Sadece iğneleri hatırlıyorum. Pompayla içimden bir şey çekip yerine başka bir şey bastı..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard is racked by an old man's hacking cough.{/n} "That thrice-blasted xenos simply chucked me aside like a piece of rubbish. I went to look for you... or for help... and I ended up here. This is where it found me, that... thing. Memory fails me, all I can remember is bits and pieces... and needles. It pumped something out of me, and it pumped something in..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard, ihtiyarlara özgü bir kuru öksürük nöbetine tutuluyor.{/n} "Boyu posu devrilesice zeno, beni tuttuğu gibi bir kenara attı. Sizin peşinize düştüm... Yardım bulmaya çalıştım... Nafile. Kendimi burada buldum. Şu ne idiği belirsiz şey burada bana musallat oldu. Hatırlamakta güçlük çekiyorum. Büyük bir kısmı aklımdan çıkmış... Sadece iğneleri hatırlıyorum. Pompayla içimden bir şey çekip yerine başka bir şey koydu..."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
